pl.szotaa

Class JdocGitMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractMojo
      • pl.szotaa.JdocGitMojo

  • public class JdocGitMojo
extends AbstractMojo
    Maven Plugin MOJO which generates JavaDocs and pushes them to GitHub Pages. Plugin assumes you enabled building GitHub Pages from /docs folder on master branch, your local git app is currently checked out at branch master and pushing won't prompt you for credentials. Created as a "hello world" Maven plugin.

      Specifies commit message which will be attached to java doc updating commit.

      Specifies which package should be javadoc'ed.
      private java.lang.String timeout
      Specifies time after which plugin assumes it failed.

      Helper method which prints process response as Maven info.
      private void pushToGithub()

    • Field Detail

      • subpackages

        private java.lang.String subpackages
        Specifies which package should be javadoc'ed. Default value = 'com'.

      • commitMessage

        private java.lang.String commitMessage
        Specifies commit message which will be attached to java doc updating commit. Default = 'Update javadoc'

      • timeout

        private java.lang.String timeout
        Specifies time after which plugin assumes it failed. Default is 10, use larger values if you internet connection is slow or generated javadoc is huge.

      • getPath

        private java.lang.String getPath(java.lang.String... folders)
        Helper method which gets absolute path to your project and appends subfolders specified in folders array. Uses correct file separators for multiple OSes.
        Parameters:
        folders - Subfolders appended to absolute project path.
        Returns:
        Correctly formatted file path.
